name: Baruch Levine
description: '''Baruch Levine''' (born December 28, 1977) is an American [[Orthodox Judaism|Orthodox Jewish]] composer and singer. His tunes have gained wide popularity at [[Shabbat]] tables and ''[[kumzits]]'' gatherings. One of his most successful compositions is "''Vezakeini''" (Give Us Merit), derived from the ancient prayer recited at [[Shabbat]] candle lighting.
